openingRemarks: Find the solution to the following equations

questions.question: \(6x - 16 = 5x - 9 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 6x-16&=5x-9\\ 6x-5x&=-9+16\\ x&=7 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 6x-16 \) if \( x=7 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=6(7)-16\\ &=42-16\\ &=26 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 5x-9 \) if \( x=7\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=5(7)-9 \\ &=35-9 \\ &=26 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(4x - 4 = 3x + 2 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 4x-4&=3x+2\\ 4x-3x&=2+4\\ x&=6 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 4x-4 \) if \( x=6 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=4(6)-4\\ &=24-4\\ &=20 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 3x+2 \) if \( x=6\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(6)+2 \\ &=18+2 \\ &=20 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(13x - 25 = 9x - 13 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 13x-25&=9x-13\\ 13x-9x&=-13+25\\ 4x&=12\\ \dfrac{4x}{4}&=\dfrac{12}{4}\\ x&=3 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 13x-25 \) if \( x=3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=13(3)-25\\ &=39-25\\ &=14 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 9x-13 \) if \( x=3\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=9(3)-13 \\ &=27-13 \\ &=14 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(3x + 39 = 2x + 42 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 3x+39&=2x+42\\ 3x-2x&=42-39\\ x&=3 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 3x+39\) if \( x= 3\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(3)+39\\ &=9+39\\ &=48 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 2x+42\) if \( x=3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(3)+42\\ &=6+42\\ &=48 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(5x - 3x = 36 - x \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 5x-3x&=36-x\\ 5x-3x+x&=36\\ 3x&=36\\ \dfrac{3x}{3} &= \dfrac{36}{3}\\ x&=12 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 5x-3x\) if \( x=12 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=5(12)-3(12)\\ &=60-36\\ &=24 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 36-x \) if \( x= 12\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=36-12\\ &=24 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(30 - x + 12 = 3x + 2 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 30-x+12&=3x+2\\ 30+12-2&=3x+x\\ 40&=4x\\ \dfrac{40}{4}&=\dfrac{4x}{4}\\ 10&=x\\ x&=10 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 30-x+12\) if \( x= 10\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=30-10+12\\ &=32 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 3x+2 \) if \( x= 10\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(10)+2\\ &=30+2\\ &=32 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(2(5x + 1) = x + 2 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 2(5x+1)&=x+2\\ 10x+2&=x+2\\ 10x-x&=2-2\\ 9x&=0\\ \dfrac{9x}{9} &= \dfrac{0}{9}\\ x&=0 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 2(5x+1)\) if \( x=0 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(5(0)+1)\\ &=2(0+1)\\ &=2(1)\\ &=2 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( x+2 \) if \( x=0 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=0+2\\ &=2 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(3x - \dfrac{1}{3} = 44\frac{2}{3} - 2x \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 3x-\dfrac{1}{3} &= 44\tfrac{2}{3} - 2x\\ 3x-\dfrac{1}{3}&=\dfrac{134}{3}-2x\\ 3 \times \left(3x-\dfrac{1}{3}\right)&= 3 \times \left(\dfrac{134}{3}-2x\right)\\ 3 \times 3x - 3 \times \dfrac{1}{3} &= 3 \times \dfrac{134}{3} - 3 \times 2x\\ 9x-1&=134-6x\\ 9x+6x&=134+1\\ 15x&=135\\ \dfrac{15x}{15} &= \dfrac{135}{15}\\ x&=9 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 3x-\dfrac{1}{3} \) if \( x= 15\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(9)-\dfrac{1}{3}\\ &=27-\dfrac{1}{3}\\ &=26.\overline{6} \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 44\tfrac{2}{3}-2x\) if \( x=9 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{134}{3}-2(9)\\ &=\dfrac{134}{3}-18\\ &=26.\overline{6} \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(2x - 3 = \dfrac{1}{5} - 6x \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 2x-3&=\dfrac{1}{5}-6x\\ 5 \times (2x-3) &= 5 \times \left(\dfrac{1}{5}-6x\right)\\ 5(2x-3) &= 5 \times \dfrac{1}{5} - 5 \times 6x\\ 10x-15&=1-30x\\ 10x+30x&=1+15\\ 40x&=16\\ \dfrac{40x}{40}&=\dfrac{16}{40}\\ x&=0.4 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 2x-3 \) if \( x=0.4 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(0.4)-3\\ &=0.8-3\\ &=-2.2 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{1}{5}-6x \) if \( x=0.4 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{1}{5} - 6(0.4)\\ &=0.2-2.4\\ &=-2.2 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(5x + 3 = \dfrac{29}{3} - \dfrac{15}{9}x \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 5x+3&=\dfrac{29}{3} - \dfrac{15x}{9}\\ 9 \times \left(5x+3\right) &=9 \times \left(\dfrac{29}{3} - \dfrac{15x}{9}\right)\\ 9(5x+3) &= 9 \times \dfrac{29}{3} - 9 \times \dfrac{15x}{9}\\ 45x+27&=87-15x\\ 45+15x&=87-27\\ 60x&=60\\ \dfrac{60x}{60} &= \dfrac{60}{60}\\ x&=1 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 5x+3 \) if \( x=1 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=5(1)+3\\ &=5+3\\ &=8 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{29}{3} - \dfrac{15x}{9}\) if \( x=1 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{29}{3} - \dfrac{15(1)}{9}\\ &=\dfrac{29}{3} - \dfrac{15}{9}\\ &=8 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(30x - 3\frac{1}{2} = 3\frac{1}{2} + 2x \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 30x-3\tfrac{1}{2} &= 3\tfrac{1}{2} + 2x\\ 30x-\dfrac{7}{2} &= \dfrac{7}{2} + 2x\\ 2 \times \left(30x-\dfrac{7}{2}\right) &= 2 \times \left(\dfrac{7}{2} + 2x\right)\\ 2 \times 30x - 2 \times \dfrac{7}{2} &= 2 \times \dfrac{7}{2} + 2 \times 2x\\ 60x-7&=7+4x\\ 60x-4x&=7+7\\ 56x&=14\\ \dfrac{56x}{56} &= \dfrac{14}{56}\\ x&=0.25 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 30x-3\tfrac{1}{2} \) if \( x= 0.25\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=30(0.25)-\dfrac{7}{2}\\ &=7.5-3.5\\ &=4 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 3\tfrac{1}{2} + 2x\) if \( x=0.25 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{7}{2}+2(0.25)\\ &=3.5+0.5\\ &=4 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(3x - \dfrac{x}{3} = 42 - 2x \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 3x - \dfrac{x}{3} &= 42-2x\\ 3 \times \left(3x - \dfrac{x}{3}\right) &= 3 \times (42-2x)\\ 3 \times 3x - 3 \times \dfrac{x}{3} &= 3(42-2x)\\ 9x-x&=126-6x\\ 9x-x+6x&=126\\ 14x&=126\\ \dfrac{14x}{14} &= \dfrac{126}{14}\\ x&=9 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( 3x - \dfrac{x}{3} \) if \( x= 9\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(9) - \dfrac{9}{3}\\ &=27-3\\ &=24 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 42-2x \) if \( x= 9\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=42-2(9)\\ &=42-18\\ &=24 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(3x + \dfrac{5}{4}x = 34 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 3x+\dfrac{5}{4}x &= 34\\ 4 \times (3x+\dfrac{5}{4}x) &= 4 \times 34\\ 4 \times 3x + 4 \times \dfrac{5}{4}x &= 136\\ 12x + 5x &= 136\\ 17x &= 136 \\ \dfrac{17x}{17} &= \dfrac{136}{17}\\ x&=8 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 34
Evaluate \( 3x+\dfrac{5}{4}x \) if \( x= 8\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=3(8)+\dfrac{5}{4}(8) \\ &=24+10\\ &=34 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(x - \dfrac{x}{2} + \dfrac{x}{3} = 5 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} x - \dfrac{x}{2} + \dfrac{x}{3} &= 5\\ 6 \times \left(x - \dfrac{x}{2} + \dfrac{x}{3}\right) &= 6 \times 5\\ 6 \times x - 6 \times \dfrac{x}{2} + 6 \times \dfrac{x}{3} &= 30\\ 6x - 3x + 2x &= 30\\ 5x &= 30\\ \dfrac{5x}{5} &= \dfrac{30}{5}\\ x&=6 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 5
Evaluate \( x - \dfrac{x}{2} + \dfrac{x}{3} \) if \( x= 6\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=6 - \dfrac{6}{2} + \dfrac{6}{3}\\ &=6-3+2\\ &=5 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} = \dfrac{x}{4} - 1 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} &= \dfrac{x}{4} - 1\\ 12 \times \left( \dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3}\right) &= 12 \times \left(\dfrac{x}{4} - 1\right)\\ 12\left(\dfrac{x}{2}\right) - 12\left(\dfrac{x}{3}\right) &= 12\left(\dfrac{x}{4}\right) - 12(1)\\ 6x-4x&=3x-12\\ 6x-4x-3x&=-12\\ -x&=-12\\ x&=12 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(\dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} \) if \( x= 12\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{12}{2} - \dfrac{12}{3}\\ &=6-4\\ &=2 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x}{4} - 1\) if \( x=12 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{12}{4} - 1\\ &=3-1\\ &=2 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{1}{3}x + \dfrac{1}{4}x = 19 - x \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{1}{3}x + \dfrac{1}{4}x &= 19 - x \\ 12 \times \left(\dfrac{1}{3}x + \dfrac{1}{4}x\right) &= 12 \times (19 - x) \\ 12\left(\dfrac{1}{3}x\right) + 12\left(\dfrac{1}{4}x\right) &= 12(19-x)\\ 4x + 3x &= 228 - 12x \\ 7x + 12x &= 228\\ 19x &= 228 \\ \dfrac{19x}{19} &= \dfrac{228}{19}\\ x&=12 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{1}{3}x + \dfrac{1}{4}x \) if \( x= 12\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{1}{3}(12) + \dfrac{1}{4}(12)\\ &=4+3\\ &=7 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 19 - x\) if \( x= 12\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=19 - 12\\ &=7 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} = \dfrac{x}{4} - \dfrac{x}{5} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} &= \dfrac{x}{4} - \dfrac{x}{5}\\ 60 \times \left(\dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3}\right) &= 60 \times \left(\dfrac{x}{4} - \dfrac{x}{5}\right)\\ 60\left(\dfrac{x}{2}\right) - 60\left(\dfrac{x}{3}\right) &= 60\left(\dfrac{x}{4}\right) - 60\left(\dfrac{x}{5}\right)\\ 30x - 20x &= 15x - 12x \\ 30x - 20x - 15x + 12x &= 0\\ 7x &= 0\\ \dfrac{7x}{7} &= \dfrac{0}{7} \\ x&=0 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} \) if \( x= 0\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{0}{2} - \dfrac{0}{3}\\ &=0-0\\ &=0 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x}{4} - \dfrac{x}{5}\) if \( x= 0\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{0}{4} - \dfrac{0}{5}\\ &=0-0\\ &=0 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(x + \dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} = 17 - \dfrac{x}{4} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} x + \dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} &= 17 - \dfrac{x}{4}\\ 12 \times \left(x + \dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} \right)&= 12 \times \left(17 - \dfrac{x}{4}\right)\\ 12 \times x + 12 \times \dfrac{x}{2} - 12 \times \dfrac{x}{3} &= 12 \times 17 - 12 \times \dfrac{x}{4}\\ 12x+6x-4x&=204-3x\\ 12x+6x-4x+3x&=204\\ \dfrac{17x}{17} &= \dfrac{204}{17}\\ x&=12 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( x + \dfrac{x}{2} - \dfrac{x}{3} \) if \( x= 12\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=12 + \dfrac{12}{2} - \dfrac{12}{3}\\ &=12 + 6 - 4\\ &=14 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 17 - \dfrac{x}{4}\) if \( x=12 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=17 - \dfrac{12}{4}\\ &=17-3\\ &=14 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{x}{2} + \dfrac{x+1}{3} = 14 + \dfrac{6 - x}{4} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{x}{2} + \dfrac{x+1}{3} &= 14 + \dfrac{6-x}{4}\\ 12 \times \left(\dfrac{x}{2} + \dfrac{x+1}{3}\right) &= 12 \times \left(14 + \dfrac{6-x}{4}\right)\\ 12 \times \dfrac{x}{2} + 12 \times \dfrac{x+1}{3} &= 12 \times 14 + 12 \times \dfrac{6-x}{4}\\ 6x + 4(x+1) &= 168 + 3(6-x) \\ 6x + 4x + 4 &= 168 + 18 - 3x \\ 6x + 4x + 3x &= 168 + 18 - 4\\ 13x &= 182\\ \dfrac{13x}{13} &= \dfrac{182}{13}\\ x&=14 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(\dfrac{x}{2} + \dfrac{x+1}{3} \) if \( x=14 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{14}{2} + \dfrac{14+1}{3} \\ &=7 + \dfrac{15}{3} \\ &=7+5\\ &=12 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 14 + \dfrac{6-x}{4}\) if \( x=14 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=14+\dfrac{6-14}{4}\\ &=14 + \dfrac{-8}{4}\\ &=14 + -2\\ &=12 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{x}{3} = \dfrac{5x-9}{4} - \dfrac{x - 1}{2} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{x}{3} &= \dfrac{5x-9}{4} - \dfrac{x-1}{2}\\ 12 \times \dfrac{x}{3} &= 12 \times \left(\dfrac{5x-9}{4} - \dfrac{x-1}{2}\right)\\ 12 \times \dfrac{x}{3} &= 12 \times \dfrac{5x-9}{4} - 12 \times \dfrac{x-1}{2}\\ 4x &= 3(5x - 9) - 6(x-1)\\ 4x &= 15x - 27 -6x+6\\ 4x -15x+6x&=-27+6\\ -5x&=-21\\ \dfrac{-5x}{-5} &= \dfrac{-21}{-5}\\ x&=4.2 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x}{3}\) if \( x= 4.2\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{4.2}{3}\\ &=1.4 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \(\dfrac{5x-9}{4} - \dfrac{x-1}{2} \) if \( x=4.2 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{5(4.2)-9}{4} - \dfrac{4.2-1}{2}\\ &=\dfrac{21-9}{4} - \dfrac{3.2}{2}\\ &=\dfrac{12}{4} - 1.6\\ &=3-1.6\\ &=1.4 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{x+5}{2} - \dfrac{9-x}{5} = \dfrac{3x+2}{20} + \dfrac{14}{5} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{x+5}{2} - \dfrac{9-x}{5} &= \dfrac{3x+2}{20} + \dfrac{14}{5}\\ 20 \times \left(\dfrac{x+5}{2} - \dfrac{9-x}{5} \right) &= 20 \times \left(\dfrac{3x+2}{20} + \dfrac{14}{5}\right)\\ 20 \times \dfrac{x+5}{2} - 20 \times \dfrac{9-x}{5} &= 20 \times \dfrac{3x+2}{20} + 20 \times \dfrac{14}{5}\\ 10(x+5) - 4(9-x) &= 3x + 2 + 56 \\ 10x + 50 - 36 + 4x &= 3x + 58 \\ 10x + 4x - 3x &= 58 - 50 + 36 \\ 11x &= 44\\ \dfrac{11x}{11} &= \dfrac{44}{11}\\ x&=4 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x+5}{2} - \dfrac{9-x}{5} \) if \( x=4 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{4+5}{2} - \dfrac{9-4}{5}\\ &=\dfrac{9}{2} - \dfrac{5}{5}\\ &= \dfrac{9}{2} - 1\\ &= \dfrac{7}{2} \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{3x+2}{20} + \dfrac{14}{5} \) if \( x=4 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{3(4)+2}{20} + \dfrac{14}{5}\\ &=\dfrac{12+2}{20} + \dfrac{14}{5}\\ &=\dfrac{7}{10} + \dfrac{14}{5}\\ &=\dfrac{7}{2} \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{2 x}{3} =8 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{2 x}{3} &=8 \\ 3 \times \dfrac{2 x}{3} &=3 \times 8 \\ 2x &= 24 \\ \dfrac{2 x}{2} &=\dfrac{24}{2} \\ x &=12 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 8
Evaluate \( \dfrac{2 x}{3} \) if \( x=12 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{2(12)}{3}\\ &=\dfrac{24}{3}\\ &=8 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{3}{5} y+\dfrac{2}{5} y=1 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{3}{5} y+\dfrac{2}{5} y&=1 \\ 5 \times \left(\dfrac{3 y}{5}+ \dfrac{2}{5} y\right)&=5 \times 1 \\ 5 \times \dfrac{3 y}{5}+5 \times \dfrac{2}{5} y&=5 \\ 3 y+2 y&=5 \\ 5y&=5\\ \dfrac{5 y}{5}&=\dfrac{5}{5} \\ &y=1 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 1
Evaluate \( \dfrac{3}{5} y+\dfrac{2 }{5}y \) if \( y=1 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{3}{5}(1)+\dfrac{2}{5}(1) \\ &=\dfrac{3}{5}+\dfrac{2}{5} \\ &=1 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{2 v}{3}=\dfrac{5}{6}-\dfrac{2 v}{3} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{2 v}{3}&=\dfrac{5}{6}-\dfrac{2 v}{3} \\ 6 \times \dfrac{2 v}{3}&=6 \times \left(\dfrac{5}{6}-\dfrac{2 v}{3}\right) \\ 6 \times \frac{2 v}{3}&=6\times\dfrac{5}{6}-6 \times \dfrac{2 v}{3} \\ 2(2 v)&=5-2(2 v) \\ 4 v&=5-4 v \\ 4 v+4 v&=5 \\ 8v&=5\\ \dfrac{8 v}{8}&=\dfrac{5}{8} \\ v&=0.625 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{2 v}{3} \) if \( v=0.625 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{2(0.625)}{3}\\ &=0.41\overline{6} \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \(\dfrac{5}{6}-\dfrac{2 v}{3} \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{5}{6}-\dfrac{2(0.625)}{3} \\ &=0.41\overline{6} \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{n}{8}+2 n-\dfrac{5 n}{6}=\dfrac{3 n}{4}+13 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{n}{8}+2 n-\dfrac{5 n}{6}&=\dfrac{3 n}{4}+13 \\ 24 \times \left(\dfrac{n}{8}+2 n-\dfrac{5 n}{6}\right)&=24 \times \left(\dfrac{3 n}{4}+13\right) \\ 24 \times \dfrac{n}{8}+24 \times 2 n-24 \times \dfrac{5 n}{6}&=24 \times \dfrac{3 n}{4}+24 \times 13 \\ 3 n+48 n-20 n&=18 n+312 \\ 3 n+48 n-20 n-18 n&=312 \\ 13n&=312\\ \dfrac{13 n}{13}&=\dfrac{312}{13} \\ n&=24 \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(\dfrac{n}{8}+2 n-\dfrac{5 n}{6}\) if \(n=24\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{24}{8}+2(24)-\dfrac{5(24)}{6} \\ &=3+48-\dfrac{5(24)}{6} \\ &=51-\dfrac{120}{6} \\ &=51-20 \\ &=31 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{3 n}{4}+13 \) if \( n=24 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{3(24)}{4} +13 \\ &=\dfrac{72}{4}+13\\ &=18+13\\ &= 31 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{7 x}{12}-\dfrac{1}{4}=2 x-\dfrac{5}{3} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{7 x}{12}-\dfrac{1}{4}&=2 x-\dfrac{5}{3} \\ 12 \times \left(\dfrac{7 x}{12}-\dfrac{1}{4}\right)&=12 \times \left(2 x-\dfrac{5}{3}\right) \\ 12 \times \dfrac{7 x}{12}-12 \times \dfrac{1}{4}&=12 \times 2 x-12 \times \dfrac{5}{3} \\ 7 x-3&=24 x-20 \\ -3+20&=24 x-7 x \\ 17&=17x\\ \dfrac{17}{17}&=\dfrac{17 x}{17} \\ 1&=x\\ x&=1 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(\dfrac{7 x}{12}-\dfrac{1}{4}\) if \(x=1\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{7(1)}{12}-\dfrac{1}{4} \\ &=\dfrac{1}{3} \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 2 x-\dfrac{5}{3} \) if \(x=1\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(1) -\dfrac{5}{3} \\ &= \dfrac{1}{3} \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{r-8}{2} =6-\dfrac{r}{3} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{r-8}{2} &=6-\dfrac{r}{3} \\ 6 \times \left(\dfrac{r-8}{2}\right) &=6 \times \left(6-\dfrac{r}{3}\right) \\ 6 \times \dfrac{r-8}{2} &=6 \times 6-6 \times \dfrac{r}{3} \\ 3(r-8) &=36-2 r \\ 3 r-24 &=36-2 r \\ 3 r+2 r &=36+24 \\ 5r&=60\\ \dfrac{5 r}{5} &=\dfrac{60}{5} \\ r &=12 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{r-8}{2} \) if \( r=12 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{12-8}{2}\\ &=\dfrac{4}{2}\\ &=2 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( 6-\dfrac{r}{3} \) if \( r=12 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=6 -\dfrac{12}{3} \\ &=6 - 4 \\ &=2 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{y-1}{2}-\dfrac{y-2}{3}=\dfrac{2}{3}-\dfrac{y-3}{4} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{y-1}{2}-\dfrac{y-2}{3}&=\dfrac{2}{3}-\dfrac{y-3}{4} \\ 12 \times \left(\dfrac{y-1}{2}-\dfrac{y-2}{3}\right)&=12 \times \left(\dfrac{2}{3}-\dfrac{y-3}{4}\right) \\ 12 \times \dfrac{y-1}{2}-12 \times \dfrac{y-2}{3}&=12 \times \dfrac{2}{3}-12 \times \dfrac{y-3}{4} \\ 6(y-1)-4(y-2)&=8-3(y-3) \\ 6 y-6-4 y+8&=8-3 y+9 \\ 6 y-4 y+3 y&=8+9-8+6 \\ 5 y&=15 \\ \dfrac{5 y}{5}&=\dfrac{15}{5} \\ y&=3 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{y-1}{2}-\dfrac{y-2}{3} \) if \( y=3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{3-1}{2}-\dfrac{3-2}{3} \\ &=\dfrac{2}{2} - \dfrac{1}{3}\\ &=1 - \dfrac{1}{3}\\ &=\dfrac{2}{3} \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{2}{3}-\dfrac{3-y}{4} \) if \( y=3 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{2}{3} -\dfrac{3-3}{4} \\ &=\dfrac{2}{3} - \dfrac{0}{4} \\ &=\dfrac{2}{3} - 0 \\ &=\dfrac{2}{3} \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{4 s+2}{11}=\dfrac{1}{5}(s+5) \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{4 s+2}{11}&=\dfrac{1}{5}(s+5) \\ 55 \times \left(\dfrac{4 s+2}{11}\right)&=55\times\left(\dfrac{1}{5}(s+5)\right) \\ 55 \times \dfrac{4s+2}{11}&=55 \times \dfrac{1}{5}(s+5) \\ 5(4s+2)&=11(s+5) \\ 20 s+10&=11s+55 \\ 20s-11s&=55-10 \\ 9s&=45\\ \dfrac{9s}{9}&=\dfrac{45}{9} \\ s&=5 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{4 s+2}{11} \) if \( s=5 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{4(5)+2}{11} \\ &=\dfrac{20+2}{11}\\ &=\dfrac{22}{11}\\ &=2 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{1}{5}(s+5) \) if \( s=5 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{1}{5}(5+5) \\ &=\dfrac{1}{5}(10)\\ &=\dfrac{10}{5}\\ &=2 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(0.5x = 3 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 0.5x&=3\\ \dfrac{0.5 x}{0.5}&=\dfrac{3}{0.5} \\ x&=6 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 3
Evaluate \( 0.5 x \) if \( x=6 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=0.5(6)\\ &=3 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(2 y-5=\dfrac{2 y+10}{6} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 2 y-5&=\dfrac{2 y+10}{6} \\ 6 \times (2 y-5)&=6\times \dfrac{2 y+10}{6} \\ 6 \times 2 y-6 \times 5&=2 y+10\\ 12 y-30&=2 y+10 \\ 12 y-2 y&=10+30 \\ 10y&=40\\ \dfrac{10 y}{10}&=\dfrac{40}{10} \\ y&=4 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \(2y-5\) if \( y=4 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=2(4)-5 \\ &=8-5 \\ &=3 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{2 y+10}{6} \) if \( y=4 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{2(4)+10}{6} \\ &=\dfrac{8+10}{6}\\ &=\dfrac{18}{6}\\ &=3 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{x+2}{4} =\dfrac{x+12}{9} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{x+2}{4} &=\dfrac{x+12}{9} \\ 36 \times \dfrac{x+2}{4} &=36 \times \dfrac{x+12}{9} \\ 9(x+2) &=4(x+12) \\ 9 x+18 &=4 x+48 \\ 9 x-4 x &=48-18 \\ 5x&=30\\ \dfrac{5 x}{5} &=\dfrac{30}{5} \\ x &=6 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x+2}{4} \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{6+2}{4}\\ &=\dfrac{8}{4}\\ &=2 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x+12}{9} \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{6+12}{9} \\ &=\dfrac{18}{9}\\ &=2 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{x-2}{5}+\dfrac{x}{3}=\dfrac{x}{2} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{x-2}{5}+\dfrac{x}{3}&=\dfrac{x}{2} \\ 30 \times \left(\dfrac{x-2}{5}+\dfrac{x}{3}\right)&=30 \times \dfrac{x}{2} \\ 30 \times \dfrac{x-2}{5}+30 \times \dfrac{x}{3}&=15x \\ 6(x-2)+10 x&=15 x \\ 6 x-12+10 x&=15 x \\ -12&=15 x-10 x-6 x \\ -12&=-x \\ -x&=-12\\ x&=12 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x-2}{5}+\dfrac{x}{3} \) if \( x=12 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{12-2}{5}+\dfrac{12}{3} \\ &=\dfrac{10}{5}+4 \\ &=2+4\\ &=6 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x}{2} \) if \( x =12 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{12}{2} \\ &=6 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{x-4}{3} =\dfrac{x-11}{10} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{x-4}{3} &=\dfrac{x-11}{10} \\ 30 \times \dfrac{x-4}{3} &=30 \times \dfrac{x-11}{10} \\ 10(x-4) &=3(x-11) \\ 10 x-40 &=3 x-33 \\ 10 x-3 x &=-33+40 \\ 7x&=7\\ \dfrac{7 x}{7} &=\dfrac{7}{7} \\ x &=1 \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x-4}{3}\) if \( x=1 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{1-4}{3}\\ &=\dfrac{-3}{3}\\ &=-1 \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{x-11}{10} \) if \( x =1 \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{1-11}{10} \\ &=\dfrac{-10}{10}\\ &=-1 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{p}{4}-\dfrac{3 p}{8}=\dfrac{1}{6} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{p}{4}-\dfrac{3 p}{8}&=\dfrac{1}{6} \\ 24 \times \left(\dfrac{p}{4}-\dfrac{3 p}{8}\right)&=24 \times \dfrac{1}{6} \\ 24 \times \dfrac{p}{4}-24 \times \dfrac{3 p}{8}&=4 \\ 6 p-9 p&=4 \\ \dfrac{-3 p}{-3}&=\dfrac{4}{-3} \\ p&=-\dfrac{4}{3} \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = \(\dfrac{1}{6}\)
Evaluate \(\dfrac{p}{4}-\dfrac{3 p}{8}\) if \(p=-\dfrac{4}{3}\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{-\dfrac{4}{3}}{4}-\dfrac{3\left(\dfrac{-4}{3}\right)}{8} \\ &=\dfrac{-4}{12}-\dfrac{-4}{8} \\ &=-\dfrac{1}{3}+\dfrac{1}{2} \\ &=\dfrac{1}{6} \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{q}{2}-\dfrac{5 q}{6}=\dfrac{1}{9} \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{q}{2}-\dfrac{5 q}{6}&=\dfrac{1}{9} \\ 54 \times \left(\dfrac{q}{2}-\dfrac{5 q}{6}\right)&=54 \times \dfrac{1}{9} \\ 54 \times \dfrac{q}{2}-54 \times \dfrac{5 q}{6}&=6\\ 27 q-45 q&=6 \\ -18q&=6\\ \dfrac{-18 q}{-18}&=\dfrac{6}{-18} \\ q&=-\dfrac{1}{3} \\ \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = \(\dfrac{1}{9}\)
Evaluate \(\dfrac{q}{2}-\dfrac{5 p}{6}\) if \(p=-\dfrac{1}{3}\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{\left(\dfrac{-1}{3}\right)}{2}- \dfrac{5\left(\dfrac{-1}{3}\right)}{6}\\ &=\dfrac{-1}{6}-\dfrac{\,\dfrac{-5}{3}\,}{6} \\ &=-\dfrac{1}{6}+\dfrac{5}{18} \\ &=\dfrac{1}{9} \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(\dfrac{z}{4}-\dfrac{3}{5}=\dfrac{z}{3}+\dfrac{2}{7} \)
\(\dfrac{w}{5}-\dfrac{2}{3}=\dfrac{w}{6}-\dfrac{1}{2} \)
\(\dfrac{1}{3}(2 x-4)=\dfrac{1}{5}\left(10+\dfrac{x}{6}\right) \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} \dfrac{1}{3}(2 x-4)&=\dfrac{1}{5}\left(10+\dfrac{x}{6}\right) \\ 15 \times \dfrac{1}{3}(2 x-4)&=15 \times \dfrac{1}{5}\left(10+\dfrac{x}{6}\right) \\ 5(2 x-4)&=3\left(10+\dfrac{x}{6}\right) \\ 10 x-20&=30+\dfrac{3 x}{6} \\ 6 \times (10 x-20)&=6 \times \left(30+\dfrac{3 x}{6}\right) \\ 6 (10 x- 20)&=6 \times 30+6 \times \dfrac{3 x}{6} \\ 60 x-120&=180+3 x \\ 60 x-3 x&=180+120 \\ 57x&=300\\ \dfrac{57 x}{57}&=\dfrac{300}{57} \\ x&=\dfrac{300}{57}\\ x&=\dfrac{100}{19} \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = RHS
Evaluate \( \dfrac{1}{3}(2 x-4)\) if \(x= \dfrac{100}{19}\)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{1}{3}\left(2\left(\dfrac{100}{19}\right)-4\right) \\ &=\dfrac{1}{3}\left(\dfrac{124}{19}\right) \\ &=\dfrac{124}{57} \end{align*} \]
Evaluate \( \dfrac{1}{5}\left(10+\dfrac{x}{6}\right) \) if \(x= \dfrac{100}{19} \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=\dfrac{1}{5}\left(10+\dfrac{\,\dfrac{100}{19}\,}{6}\right)\\ &=\dfrac{1}{5}\left(10+\dfrac{50}{57}\right)\\ &=\dfrac{1}{5}\left(\dfrac{620}{57}\right)\\ &=\dfrac{124}{57} \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(7\left(\dfrac{x}{2}+12\right)-\dfrac{1}{4}(3 x-1)=0 \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 7\left(\dfrac{x}{2}+12\right)-\dfrac{1}{4}(3 x-1)&=0 \\ 7\left(\dfrac{x}{2}+12\right)-\dfrac{1}{4}(3 x-1)&=0 \\ \dfrac{7 x}{2}+84-\dfrac{1}{4}(3 x-1)&=0 \\ 8 \times \left(\dfrac{7 x}{2}+84-\dfrac{1}{4}(3 x-1)\right) &= 8 \times 0 \\ 8 \times \dfrac{7 x}{2}+8 \times 84-8 \times \dfrac{1}{4}(3 x-1)&=0 \\ 28 x+672-2(3 x-1)&=0 \\ 28 x+672-6 x+2&=0 \\ 28 x-6 x&=-672-2 \\ 22x&=-674\\ \dfrac{22 x}{22}&=-\dfrac{674}{22} \\ x&=\dfrac{-337}{11} \end{align*} \]
Check LHS = 0
Evaluate \( 7\left(\dfrac{x}{2}+12\right)-\dfrac{1}{4}(3 x-1) \) if \(x= -\dfrac{337}{11} \)
\[ \begin{align*} &=7\left(\dfrac{\left(-\dfrac{337}{11}\right) }{2}+12\right)-\dfrac{1}{4}\left(3 \left(-\dfrac{337}{11}\right) -1\right) \\ &=7\left(-\dfrac{337}{22}+12\right)-\dfrac{1}{4}\left(-\dfrac{1011}{11} -1\right)\\ &=7\left(-\dfrac{73}{22}\right)-\dfrac{1}{4}\left(-\dfrac{1022}{11} \right)\\ &=-\dfrac{511}{22} + \dfrac{511}{22}\\ &=0 \end{align*} \]

questions.question: \(3 t+4=12+3 t \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 3 t+4&=12+3 t \\ 3 t-3 t&=12-4 \\ 0&=8\\ \end{align*} \]
Since \(0=8\) is always false, no value of \(t\) satisfies the equation

questions.question: \(12 y+6=6(2 y+1) \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 12 y+6&=6(2 y+1) \\ 12 y+6&=12 y+6 \\ 12 y-12 y&=6-6 \\ 0&=0\\ \end{align*} \]
Since \(0=0\) is always true, any value of \(y\) satisfies the equation

questions.question: \(3(4 g+6)=2(6 g+9) \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 3(4 g+6)&=2(6 g+9) \\ 12 g+18&=12 g+18 \\ 12 g-12 g&=18-18 \\ 0&=0\\ \end{align*} \]
Since \(0=0\) is always true, any value of \(g\) satisfies the equation

questions.question: \(5(1+2 m)=\dfrac{1}{2}(8+20 m) \)
questions.answer:
\[ \begin{align*} 5(1+2 m)&=\dfrac{1}{2}(8+20 m) \\ 2 \times 5(1+2 m)&=2 \times \dfrac{1}{2}(8+20 m) \\ 10(1+2 m)&=8+20 m \\ 10+20 m&=8+20 m \\ 20 m-20 m&=8-10 \\ 0&=-2\\ \end{align*} \]
Since \(0=-2\) is always false, no value of \(m\) satisfies the equation
